name: Acidic Rain Barrel
tooltip: Throws a rolling barrel that explodes on wall collision
Stealth strikes make it rain on collision

debuffs.name: Sulphuric Poisoning
debuffs.tooltip: The acidic water burns away your flesh

name: Adamantite Throwing Axe
tooltip: Stealth strikes summon lighting bolts on enemy hits

name: Alpha Virus
tooltip: Throws a giant plague cell with a lethal aura that splits into 6 plague seekers on death
Stealth strikes cause the plague cell to move slower, accumulating an aura of swirling plague seekers as it flies

name: Apoctolith
tooltip: Maybe catching bricks with your face isn’t such a hot idea…
Critical hits tear away enemy defense
Stealth strikes shatter and briefly stun enemies

name: Ashen Stalactite
tooltip: Throws a fast, small stalactite that crumbles to dust after travelling a short distance
Stealth strikes cause a larger, more damaging stalagmite to be thrown which travels slower and further before crumbling to damaging dust

name: Auroradical Throw
tooltip: Launches a star that splits after a short period of time
Split stars home in on nearby enemies after a few seconds
Stealth strikes summon a meteor upon enemy impact

name: Ballistic Poison Bomb
tooltip: Throws a sticky bomb that explodes into spikes and poison clouds
Stealth strikes throw three at once

name: Blast Barrel
tooltip: Throws a rolling barrel that explodes on wall collision
Stealth strikes makes the barrel bounce twice before disappearing with varied effects after each bounce
'Some people used to jump over these'

name: Blazing Star
tooltip: Stacks up to 4
Stealth strikes release all stars at once with infinite piercing

name: Bloodsoaked Crasher
tooltip: Slows down when hitting an enemy. Speeds up otherwise
Heals on enemy hits
Stealth strikes spawn homing blood on enemy hits

name: Bouncing Betty
tooltip: Throws a grenade which bounces after exploding
Stealth strikes explode into a violent blast of fire and shrapnel when it bounces

name: Bouncing Eyeball
tooltip: Throws an eyeball that bounces off of surfaces.
Critical chance is doubled during a blood moon
Stealth strikes cause the eyeballs to move much faster and bounce more energetically

name: Bouncy Spiky Ball
tooltip: Throws a very bouncy ball that richochets [sic] off walls and enemies
Receives a small boost in damage and velocity after bouncing off an enemy
Stealth strikes provide a bigger boost after richocheting [sic]

name: Brackish Flask
tooltip: Explodes into poisonous seawater blasts
Stealth strikes summon a brackish spear spike

name: Brimblade
tooltip: Throws a blade that splits on enemy hits
Stealth strikes split further and cause the player to launch a barrage of brimstone darts

name: Burning Strife
tooltip: Throws a shadowflame spiky ball that bursts into flames
Stealth Strikes make the ball linger and explode more violently
'Definitely not pocket safe'

name: Celestial Reaper
tooltip: Throws a fast homing scythe
The scythe will bounce after hitting an enemy up to six times
Stealth strikes create damaging afterimages

name: Celestus
tooltip: Throws a scythe that splits into multiple scythes on enemy hits
Stealth strikes reverse direction and home in on enemies after returning to the player

name: Cinquedea
tooltip: Stealth strikes home in after hitting an enemy

name: Cobalt Kunai
tooltip: Stealth strikes fire three homing cobalt energy bolts

name: Consecrated Water
tooltip: The bottle is surprisingly dusty
Throws a holy flask of water that explodes into a sacred flame pillar on death
The pillar is destroyed if there's no tiles below it
Stealth strikes create three flame pillars instead of one on impact

name: Contaminated Bile
tooltip: Throws a flask of sickly green, irradiated bile which explodes on collision
Stealth strikes make the explosion much more violent and powerful

name: Corpus Avertor
tooltip: Seems like it has worn down over time
Attacks grant lifesteal based on damage dealt
The lower your HP the more damage this weapon does and heals the player on enemy hits
Stealth strikes throw a single rainbow outlined dagger
On enemy hits, this dagger boosts the damage and life regen of all members of your team
However, there is a small chance it will cut your health in half instead

name: Cosmic Kunai
tooltip: Fires a stream of short-range kunai
Stealth strikes spawn 5 Cosmic Scythes which home and explode

name: Cranium Smasher
tooltip: Throws disks that roll on the ground, occasionally launches an explosive disk
Stealth strikes launch an explosive disk that can pierce several enemies

name: Crushsaw Crasher
tooltip: Throws bouncing axes
Stealth strikes throw five at once

name: Crystal Piercer
tooltip: Throws a crystal javelin that pierces infinitely
Stealth strikes travel through blocks, ignore gravity, and summon crystal shards as they fly

debuffs.name: Frostburn
debuffs.tooltip: It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts

name: Crystalline
tooltip: Splits into several projectiles as it travels
Stealth strikes make the blade split more and create crystals when destroyed

name: Cursed Dagger
tooltip: Throws bouncing daggers
Stealth strikes are showered in cursed fireballs

debuffs.name: Cursed Inferno
debuffs.tooltip: Losing lifeAll damage taken increased by 20%

name: Cursed Spear
tooltip: Throws an cursed flame tipped trident
Stealth strikes are showered in cursed fireballs

debuffs.name: Cursed Inferno
debuffs.tooltip: Losing lifeAll damage taken increased by 20%

name: Deck of Souls
tooltip: Fires high velocity talismans that ignore gravity
Talismans attach to enemies, causing them to release lost souls
Stealth strikes release more souls and leave behind souls as they travel

name: Deep Sea Dumbbell
tooltip: Swings a dumbbell that hits and flings weights with each attack
Right click to flex

name: Deep Wounder
tooltip: Throws an abyssal hatchet that inflicts Armor Crunch and Marked for Death to the enemies it hits
Stealth strikes cause the hatchet to be thrown faster and trail water, inflicting Crush Depth in addition to the other debuffs

name: Defective Sphere
tooltip: Fires a variety of deadly spheres with different effects
Stacks up to 5
Stealth strikes launch all 4 sphere types at once

name: Deific Thunderbolt
tooltip: Fires a lightning bolt to electrocute enemies
The lightning bolt travels faster while it is raining
Summons lightning from the sky on impact
Stealth strikes summon more lightning and travel faster

name: Desecrated Water
tooltip: Throws an unholy flask of water that explodes into an explosion of bubbles on death
Stealth strikes spawn additional bubbles that inflict Ichor and Cursed Inferno

debuffs.name: Cursed Inferno
debuffs.tooltip: Losing lifeAll damage taken increased by 20%

name: Duke's Decapitator
tooltip: Throws a hydro axe which shreds enemies when it comes into contact with them
The faster it's spinning, the more times it hits before disappearing
Stealth Strikes make it emit short-ranged bubbles.

name: Duststorm in a Bottle
tooltip: Explodes into a dust cloud
Stealth strikes form a more intense and longer lasting dust cloud

name: Dynamic Pursuer
tooltip: A weapon that, as it flies, processes calculations and fires electricity
Releases a flying disk that fires electricity at nearby enemies
Stealth strikes allow the disk to ricochet multiple times and unleash an electric explosion, then fire inaccurate lasers while returning

name: Eclipse's Fall
tooltip: When the sun goes dark, you will know judgement
Summons spears from the sky on hit
Stealth strikes impale enemies and summon a constant barrage of spears over time

name: Ecological Collapse
tooltip: And there was no more ground to be seen...
Throws out up to 10 lumenous mines with lightning auras
Stealth strikes ignore the 10 mine cap, but dissipate quicker

name: Elemental Disk
tooltip: Throws a disk that has a chance to generate several disks if enemies are near it
Stealth strikes fly slower but travel farther, pierce through enemies, and spawn extra disks more frequently

debuffs.name: Frostburn
debuffs.tooltip: It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts

name: Enchanted Axe
tooltip: Throws a high velocity axe that returns to you after traveling a short distance or hitting a wall
At the furthest point from the player, a magical axe that travels through walls will be cast towards the nearest enemy
Stealth strikes make the axe fly further, throwing out many other magical axes in all directions

name: Epidemic Shredder
tooltip: Contrary to its name, it will probably cause an epidemic if used incorrectly
Throws a plagued boomerang that releases plague seekers when it hits tiles or enemies
Stealth strikes cause the boomerang to release plague seekers constantly as it travels

debuffs.name: Plague
debuffs.tooltip: You are rotting from the inside

name: Equanimity
tooltip: Throws a dark/light boomerang that confuses enemies
The boomerang will create light shards upon hitting enemies when thrown out, and will fire homing dark shards when returning
Stealth strikes cause the boomerang to create both dark and light shards whenever one type would be created

name: Eradicator
tooltip: Throws a disk that fires lasers at nearby enemies
Stealth strikes stick to enemies and unleash a barrage of lasers in all directions

debuffs.name: Frostburn
debuffs.tooltip: It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts

name: Executioner's Blade
tooltip: Throws a stream of homing blades
Stealth strikes summon a guillotine of blades on hit

name: Exodimus
tooltip: Throws out a spread of daggers that aggressively dart towards enemies
The daggers stick into hit enemies and deal continous damage, with a max of 20 daggers at once
After 10 seconds, each dagger explodes into a cross of laser beams
Stealth strikes double the amount of beams on dissipation into an 8 pointed star

name: Exorcism
tooltip: Throws a hallowed cross which explodes into a flash of light that damages nearby enemies, closer enemies receiving more damage
As the cross travels downwards, the damage inflicted by both the cross and flash increases constantly
Stealth strikes cause the cross to be thrown with full damage immediately. Hallowed stars fall when the cross explodes

name: Fantasy Talisman
tooltip: Fires high velocity talismans that ignore gravity
Talismans attach to enemies, causing them to release lost souls
Stealth strikes release more souls and leave behind souls as they travel

name: Feather Knife
tooltip: Throws a knife which summons homing feathers
Stealth strike throws a volley of knives

name: Fishbone Boomerang
tooltip: Though the evaporating Sea Kingdom fought a losing battle, its proud inhabitants did not go down easily.
As a last resort, they had to fashion weapons from the skeletons of dead animals.

name: Frequency Manipulator
tooltip: A long device, used in the tuning of some rather... original machines.
Swings a spear around and then throws it
On collision, the spear releases a burst of homing energy
Stealth strikes release more energy and explode on collision
Current Charge: [CHARGE]

name: Frostcrush Valari
tooltip: Fires a long ranged boomerang that explodes into icicles on hit
Stealth strikes throw three short ranged boomerangs along with a spread of icicles

debuffs.name: Frostburn
debuffs.tooltip: It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts

debuffs.name: Glacial State
debuffs.tooltip: Cannot move and defense is shattered

name: Frosty Flare
tooltip: Do not insert in flare gun
Sticks to enemies
Generates a localized hailstorm
Stealth strikes trail snowflakes and summon phantom copies instead of ice shards

debuffs.name: Glacial State
debuffs.tooltip: Cannot move and defense is shattered

debuffs.name: Frostburn
debuffs.tooltip: It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts

name: Gacruxian Mollusk
tooltip: Releases homing sparks while traveling
Stealth strikes release homing snails that create even more sparks

name: Gel Dart
tooltip: Throws bouncing darts
Stealth strikes ignore gravity and bounce more vigorously
They additionally leak slime and cover enemies in dark sludge

name: Ghoulish Gouger
tooltip: Throws sets of four ghoulish scythes at ultra high velocity
Stealth strikes summon a flurry of tormented souls on hit

name: Gilded Dagger
tooltip: Throws a shiny blade that ricochets towards another enemy on hit
Stealth strikes cause the blades to home in after ricocheting, with each ricochet dealing 20% more damage
Stealth strikes also have increased piercing

name: Glaive
tooltip: Stacks up to 3
Stealth strikes are super fast and pierce infinitely

name: Gleaming Dagger
tooltip: Throws a shiny blade that ricochets towards another enemy on hit
Stealth strikes cause the blades to home in after ricocheting, with each ricochet dealing 20% more damage
Stealth strikes also have increased piercing

name: God's Paranoia
tooltip: Shoots a speedy homing spiky ball. Stacks up to 10.
Attaches to enemies and summons a localized storm of god slayer kunai
Stealth strikes home in faster and summon kunai at a faster rate
Right click to delete all existing spiky balls

name: Grave Grimreaver
tooltip: Hurls a cursed scythe which homes in
The scythe summons skulls as it flies and explodes into bats on hit
Stealth strikes spawn a flood of bats and falling skulls
Inflicts cursed flames and confusion
'A dapper skeleton's weapon of choice'

name: Hardened Honeycomb
tooltip: Fires a honeycomb that shatters into fragments
Grants the honey buff to the player it touches
Stealth strikes can bounce off walls and enemies

name: Heavenfallen Stardisk
tooltip: Throws a stardisk upwards which then launches itself towards your mouse cursor,
explodes into several astral energy bolts if the thrower is moving vertically when throwing it and during its impact
Stealth strikes rain astral energy bolts from the sky

name: Hell's Sun
tooltip: The Subterranean Sun in the palm of your hand.
Shoots a gravity-defying spiky ball. Stacks up to 10.
Once stationary, periodically emits small suns that explode on hit
Stealth strikes emit suns at a faster rate and last for a longer amount of time
Right click to delete all existing spiky balls

name: Hypothermia
tooltip: Fires a constant barrage of black ice shards
Stealth strikes hurl a set of razor sharp ice chunks that shatter on impact

debuffs.name: Frostburn
debuffs.duration: 2 seconds (black ice shards)5 seconds (black ice chunk)
debuffs.tooltip: It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts

name: Ice Star
tooltip: Throws homing ice stars
Stealth strikes pierce infinitely and spawn ice shards on hit
Ice Stars are too brittle to be recovered after being thrown

debuffs.name: Frostburn
debuffs.tooltip: It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts

name: Icebreaker
tooltip: Stealth strikes spawn a cosmic explosion and freeze nearby enemies on enemy hits

debuffs.name: Frostburn
debuffs.tooltip: It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts

debuffs.name: Glacial State
debuffs.tooltip: Cannot move and defense is shattered

name: Ichor Dagger
tooltip: Throws bouncing daggers
Stealth strikes are showered in streams of ichor

name: Ichor Spear
tooltip: Throws an ichor tipped trident
Stealth strikes are showered in splashes of ichor

name: Infernal Kris
tooltip: Throws a burning dagger that starts spinning after travelling a short distance, inflicting additional damage while spinning
Stealth strikes cause the dagger to be engulfed in flames, exploding on contact with walls and enemies

debuffs.name: On Fire!
debuffs.duration: 1.5 seconds (Cinder)3 seconds (Explosion)3-5 seconds (Dagger)4-7 seconds (Stealth Strike Dagger)

name: Infested Clawmerang
tooltip: Fires a slow, long-ranged boomerang
Stealth strikes grant the Mushy buff to the user on enemy hits and summon homing spores

name: Iron Francisca
tooltip: The franciscas do more damage for a short time when initially thrown
Stealth strikes pierce infinitely

name: Jaws of Oblivion
tooltip: Throws a tight spread of six venomous reaper fangs that stick in enemies
Stealth strikes cause the teeth to emit a crushing shockwave on impact
You're gonna need a bigger boat

name: Kelvin Catalyst
tooltip: Throws an icy blade that splits into multiple ice stars on enemy hits
Stealth strikes will briefly gain sentience and ram nearby enemies before returning to the player

debuffs.name: Frostburn
debuffs.tooltip: It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts

name: Kylie
tooltip: Stealth strikes throws three short ranged kylies instead of a single long range one
'Also known as Dowak'

name: Latcher Mine
tooltip: Sticks to enemies on hit and detonates after 3 seconds
Breaks upon hitting blocks
Stealth Strike Effect: On explosion, fire and shrapnel are released
Stealth strike mines can stick to the ground and last much longer when doing so

name: Lead Tomahawk
tooltip: The tomahawks have more damage for a short time when initially thrown
Stealth strikes pierce infinitely

name: Leonid Progenitor
tooltip: Throws a bombshell that explodes, summoning a meteor to impact the site
Right click to throw a spread of gravity affected comets that explode, leaving behind a star
Stealth strikes lob a bombshell that additionally splits into comets on hit

debuffs.name: Astral Infection (debuff)
debuffs.duration: 4 seconds (Bombshells, Large Comets)2 seconds (Small Comets, Stars)

name: Leviathan Teeth
tooltip: Rapidly throws a variety of poisonous fangs that stick to enemies
Stealth strikes cause 3 very fast teeth to be thrown, ignoring gravity and inflicting extreme knockback

name: Lionfish
tooltip: Sticks to enemies and injects a potent toxin
Stealth strikes are trailed by homing urchin spikes

name: Luminous Striker
tooltip: Send the stars back to where they belong
Throws a stardust javelin trailed by rising stardust shards
Explodes into additional stardust shards upon hitting enemies
Stealth strikes cause the stardust shards to fly alongside the javelin instead of rising

name: Lunar Kunai
tooltip: Throws out a set of three kunai that ignore gravity and slightly home in on enemies
After traveling enough distance, the kunai supercharge with lunar energy, homing in far more aggressively and exploding on impact
Stealth Strikes instantly throw eight supercharged Kunai

name: Malachite
tooltip: Throws a stream of kunai that stick to enemies and explode
Right click to throw a single kunai that pierces, after piercing an enemy it emits a massive explosion on the next enemy hit
Stealth strikes fire three kunai that home in, stick to enemies, and explode

name: Mangrove Chakram
tooltip: Stealth strikes leave a trail of lingering flowers

debuffs.name: Cursed Inferno
debuffs.tooltip: Losing lifeAll damage taken increased by 20%

name: Metal Monstrosity
tooltip: This has to hurt
Hurls a heavy metal ball that shatters on impact
Stealth strikes cause the ball to release spikes as it travels

name: Meteor Fist
tooltip: Fires a fist that explodes
Stealth strikes make the fist ricochet between enemies up to 4 times

name: Molten Amputator
tooltip: Throws a scythe that emits molten globs on enemy hits
Stealth strikes spawn molten globs periodically in flight and more on-hit

name: Monkey Darts
tooltip: Stealth strikes throw 3 bouncing darts at high speed
'Perfect for popping'

name: Mycoroot
tooltip: Fires a stream of short-range fungal roots
Stealth strikes spawn an explosion of fungi spores

name: Mythril Knife
tooltip: Stealth strikes inflict a wide assortment of debuffs

name: Nanoblack Reaper
tooltip: Annihilates anything it touches with one large swing
Takes 10 seconds to charge, each 10% of charge will release homing 75 energy blades
Holding it uncharged will rapidly heal you
Stealth strikes will release 575 energy blades on hit
'She smothered them in Her hatred'

name: Nasty Cholla
tooltip: Throws a spiky ball that sticks to everything
Explodes into cactus spikes after roughly 3 seconds
Can hurt town NPCs
Stealth strikes throw five at once

name: Night's Gaze
tooltip: Strike your foes with this spear of the night
Throws a spear that shatters when it hits an enemy
Stealth strikes cause the spear to summon homing stars as it flies

name: Nychthemeron
tooltip: Throws a spiky ball that ignores gravity and summons a pair of light and dark orbs that orbit the player
Once the spiky ball disappears the orbs will home in on the nearest target
Stacks up to 10
Stealth strikes cause all spiky balls and orbs to be thrown at once
Right click to recall all existing spiky balls

name: Orichalcum Spiked Gemstone
tooltip: Stealth strikes last longer and summon petals on enemy hits

name: Palladium Javelin
tooltip: Stealth strikes split into more javelins

name: Penumbra
tooltip: Throws a shadow bomb that explodes into homing souls
Stealth strikes make the bomb manifest on the cursor and explode into more souls

name: Phantasmal Ruin
tooltip: Fires an enormous ghost lance that emits lost souls as it flies
Explodes into tormented souls on enemy hits
Stealth strikes continuously leave spectral clones in their wake

name: Phantom Lance
tooltip: Fires a spectral javelin that rapidly releases lost souls
Fades away and slows down over time
Lost souls released later deal less damage
Stealth strikes don't slow down and souls always deal full damage

name: Plaguenade
tooltip: Releases a swarm of angry plague bees
Stealth strikes spawn more bees and generate a larger explosion

name: Poison Pack
tooltip: Throws a poisonous spiky ball. Stacks up to 3.
Stealth strikes cause the balls to release spore clouds
Right click to delete all existing spiky balls

name: Prismalline
tooltip: Throws daggers that split after a while
Stealth strikes additionally explode into prism shards and briefly stuns enemies

name: Profaned Nucleus
tooltip: Throws out a molten chunk of profaned rock that explodes and splits into crystals
Stealth strikes leave behind lingering patches of magma

name: Profaned Partisan
tooltip: Fires an unholy spear that explodes on death
Stealth strikes spawn smaller spears to fly along side it

name: Quasar
tooltip: Succ
Stealth strikes spawn more explosions

name: Radiant Star
tooltip: Throws daggers that explode and split after a while
Stealth strike splits more with a devastating explosion and sucks in enemies

name: Refraction Rotor
tooltip: Fires a huge prismatic disk shuriken
The shuriken shatters moments after impact into homing rockets
Stealth strikes shatter into many more rockets

name: Regulus Riot
tooltip: Fires a swift homing disk
Stealth strikes explode into energy stars

name: Rot Ball
tooltip: Stealth strikes spawn rain clouds on enemy hits

debuffs.name: Cursed Inferno
debuffs.tooltip: Losing lifeAll damage taken increased by 20%

name: Sacrifice
tooltip: Throws sacrificial daggers that lodge themselves in enemies
Right click causes all stuck daggers to fly back at you and give you life
Daggers stuck to enemies release bloodsplosions over time
Stealth strikes provide much more life when returning to you

name: Sand Dollar
tooltip: Stacks up to 2
Stealth strikes throw 2 long ranged sand dollars that explode into coral shards on enemy hits

name: Sandslasher
tooltip: Throws a huge shuriken made out of fused sand unaffected by gravity which slowly accelerates horizontally
It does more damage depending on how fast it goes horizontally and how long it has been flying for
Stealth strikes periodically release sand clouds

name: Scarlet Devil
tooltip: Throws an ultra high velocity spear, which creates more projectiles that home in
The spear creates a Scarlet Blast upon hitting an enemy
Stealth strikes grant summon a star of projectiles upon hitting an enemy
'Divine Spear "Spear The Gungnir"'

name: Scourge of the Desert
tooltip: Gains velocity over time
Stealth strikes gain damage as they damage enemies

name: Scourge of the Seas
tooltip: Snaps apart into a venomous cloud upon striking an enemy
Stealth strikes are coated with vile toxins, afflicting enemies with a powerful debuff

debuffs.name: Sulphuric Poisoning
debuffs.duration: 3 seconds (Stealth strike javelin)2 seconds (Stealth strike toxic clouds)
debuffs.tooltip: The acidic water burns away your flesh

name: Seafoam Bomb
tooltip: Throws a bomb that explodes into a bubble which deals extra damage to enemies
Stealth strikes are faster and explode into 5 bubbles

name: Sealed Singularity
tooltip: Shatters on impact, summoning a black hole that sucks in nearby enemies
Stealth strikes summon a black hole that lasts longer and sucks enemies with a stronger force

name: Seared Pan
tooltip: dAMaGe iS rAthEr cOnSisTeNT
Fires a frying pan at high velocity
Enemy hits summon fireballs that linger around the target
Landing three consecutive hits grants will launch a golden pan
Golden pans cause all fireballs to aggressively home in on their target
Stealth strikes act similar to golden pans but also explode into golden sparks
Stealth strikes also summon additional fireballs on hit

name: Seashell Boomerang
tooltip: Stealth strikes fire seashells at nearby enemies

name: Seraphim
tooltip: Throws an extraordinarily fast dagger which slows down exponentially and dissipates into light
Once dissipation has ended, 6 fast, splitting blades that aim at and slice nearby targets are released, along
with a large laserbeam
Stealth strikes release a volley of 9 lights which explode into smaller laser beams along with the dagger

name: Shadow's Descent
tooltip: Shoots a shadow ball that ignores gravity and slows down after a short time.
While stationary, it shoots spirits and covers an area in a large shadow
Stealth strikes also emit dark pulses while stationary
Right click to delete all existing shadow balls
'They didn't understand its nature, so it was sealed away...'

name: Shard of Antumbra
tooltip: Stealth strikes leave homing stars in their wake

name: Shattered Sun
tooltip: Throws daggers that split into scorching homing daggers
Stealth strikes fire volleys of homing daggers from the player on dagger hits that suck enemies in

name: Shinobi Blade
tooltip: Throws a fast blade that spawns healing orbs when it kills an enemy
Stealth strikes cause 3 blades to be thrown at once

name: Shock Grenade
tooltip: Throws a grenade that explodes into a burst of lightning
Stealth strikes cause the grenade to leave an electrifying aura when it explodes

name: Shroomerang
tooltip: Fires a slow, long-ranged boomerang
Stealth strikes grant the Mushy buff to the user on enemy hits and summon homing spores

name: Sky Stabber
tooltip: Shoots a gravity-defying spiky ball. Stacks up to 4.
Stealth strikes make the balls rain feathers onto enemies when they hit
Right click to delete all existing spiky balls

name: Skyfin Bombers
tooltip: Fishy bombers inbound!
Launches a skyfin nuke that homes in on enemies below it
Stealth strikes rapidly home in regardless of enemy position

name: Slick Cane
tooltip: Swipes a cane that steals money from enemies.
Stealth strikes gives a 1 in 15 chance for enemies to drop 1-3 gold coins when hit
'Economy at its finest'

name: Sludge Splotch
tooltip: Slows non-boss enemies slightly
Stealth strikes cause the main ball of sludge to split on hit, inflicting more damage

name: Snap Clam
tooltip: Can latch on enemies and deal damage over time
Stealth strikes throw five clams at once that cause increased damage over time

name: Spear of Destiny
tooltip: Throws three spears with the outer two having homing capabilities
Stealth strikes cause all three spears to home in, ignore tiles, and pierce more

name: Spear of Liberty
tooltip: Throws three spears with the outer two having homing capabilities
Stealth strikes cause all three spears to home in, ignore tiles, and pierce more

debuffs.name: Cursed Inferno
debuffs.tooltip: Losing lifeAll damage taken increased by 20%

name: Spear of Paleolith
tooltip: Throws an ancient spear that shatters enemy armor
Spears rain fossil shards as they travel
Stealth strikes travel slower but further, raining more fossil shards

name: Spent Fuel Container
tooltip: War Never Changes
Throws a fuel container with trace amounts of plutonium that causes a nuclear explosion
The explosion does not occur if there are no tiles below it
Stealth strikes leave a lingering irradiated zone after the explosion dissipates

name: Star of Destruction
tooltip: Fires a huge destructive mine that explodes into destruction bolts
Amount of bolts scales with enemies hit, up to 16
Stealth strikes always explode into the max amount of bolts

name: Stellar Knife
tooltip: Throws knives that stop middair and then home into enemies
Stealth strikes throw a volley of 10 knives in a spread
Za Warudo

name: Sticky Spiky Ball
tooltip: Throws a spiky ball that sticks to everything
Stealth strikes throw seven at once and last a lot longer

name: Stormfront Razor
tooltip: Throws a throwing knife that leaves sparks as it travels.
Stealth strikes cause the knife to be faster and leave a huge shower of sparks as it travels

name: Subduction Slicer
tooltip: Throws a scythe that explodes on enemy hits
Stealth strikes also summon an orange pillar of fire on enemy hits

name: Supernova
tooltip: Creates a massive explosion on impact
Explodes into spikes and homing energy
Stealth strikes release energy as they fly

name: Sylvan Slasher
tooltip: Summons a slash attack at the cursor's position
Enemy hits build stealth and cause sword waves to fire from the player in the opposite direction
Does not consume stealth and cannot stealth strike

name: System Bane
tooltip: Can be used to quickly send out an electromagnetic blast
Hurls an unstable device which sticks to the ground and shocks nearby enemies with lightning
Stealth strikes make the device emit a large, damaging EMP field
Current Charge: [CHARGE]

name: Tarragon Throwing Dart
tooltip: Fires a piercing dart with reduced immunity frames
Stealth strikes erupt into thorns on enemy hits

name: Terra Disk
tooltip: Throws a disk that has a chance to generate several disks if enemies are near it
A max of three disks can be active at a time
Stealth strikes travel slower and are rapidly orbited by the smaller disks

name: Terror Talons
tooltip: Fires small wavering claws
Stealth strikes launch a large, high speed claw which pierces

name: The Atom Splitter
tooltip: Throws a quantum-superimposed javelin that strikes from numerous timelines at once
Stealth strikes perform far more simultaneous strikes

name: The Final Dawn
tooltip: We shall ride into the sunrise once more
Attack enemies with a giant scythe swing to replenish stealth
Press up and attack to throw the scythe
Stealth strikes perform a horizontal swing that leaves a lingering fire aura
Stealth strikes performed while pressing up fling yourself at the enemy and slice through them, causing homing fireballs to emerge

debuffs.name: Holy Flames
debuffs.duration: 5 seconds (Slash, Horizontal Slash)4 seconds (Thrown, Fireball)3 seconds (Flame)

name: The Reaper
tooltip: Slice ‘n dice
Stealth strikes throw four at once

name: The Syringe
tooltip: Throws a high velocity syringe that increases damage as it travels
Shatters into glass and plague cinders on impact
Stealth strikes also shatter into plague bees
'I'm pretty sure this isn't healthy'

name: Throwing Brick
tooltip: Prove its resistance by throwing it upwards and catching it with your face
Throws a brick that shatters if stealth is full.

name: Time Bolt
tooltip: There should be no boundary to human endeavor.
Stealth strikes can hit more enemies and create a larger time field

name: Titanium Shuriken
tooltip: Stealth strikes act like a boomerang that spawns clones on enemy hits

name: Tooth Ball
tooltip: Stealth strikes spawn rain clouds on enemy hits

name: Totality Breakers
tooltip: Explodes into highly flammable black tar
Tar oils enemies and sets them alight
Stealth strikes leak tar as they fly

debuffs.name: Oiled
debuffs.tooltip: Taking more damage from being on fire

name: Toxicant Twister
tooltip: Throws a slow moving boomerang
After a few moments, the boomerang chooses a target and rapidly homes in
Stealth strikes home in faster and rapidly release sand

debuffs.name: Sulphuric Poisoning
debuffs.tooltip: The acidic water burns away your flesh

name: Tracking Disk
tooltip: A weapon that, as it flies, processes calculations and breaks
Releases a flying disk that breaks
Stealth strikes allow the disk to break faster
Current Charge: [CHARGE]

name: Turbulance
tooltip: Fires a cloudy javelin that bursts into wind slashes on hit
Wind slashes home if the javelin crits
Stealth strikes are trailed by homing wind slashes

name: Unsealed Singularity
tooltip: Cold and alone in the void...
Throws a volley of five void flasks which shatter on impact
Shattered flasks summon blackholes which pull in enemies and purple void matter
Stealth strikes throw one flask that creates a gigantic blackhole with significantly larger purple void matter

name: Urchin Stinger
tooltip: Stealth strikes stick to enemies while releasing sulfuric bubbles

name: Utensil Poker
tooltip: Space chickens, that is all.
Fires random utensils in bursts of three
Grants Well Fed on enemy hits
Stealth strikes replace any utensil with a powerful butcher knife

buffs.name: Well Fed
buffs.tooltip: Minor improvements to all statsMinor improvements to all stats and increased life regeneration

name: Valediction
tooltip: Throws a homing reaper scythe
Stealth strikes spawn razorblade typhoons on enemy hits

name: Wave Pounder
tooltip: It utilizes its power to send heavy shockwaves throughout the area, causing agonizing internal damage
Throws a bomb which explodes into a forceful shockwave
Stealth strikes emit absurdly powerful shockwaves
Current Charge: [CHARGE]

name: Wave Skipper
tooltip: Throws a spear that bounces a lot
Stealth strikes throw three high speed spears

name: Web Ball
tooltip: Throws a web-covered ball that covers enemies in cobwebs to slow them down
Stealth strikes slow enemies down longer

name: Wrathwing
tooltip: Throws an agile, homing winged spear that constantly spits fire
Stealth strikes create an eruption of cinders on hit

name: Wreath of Belial
tooltip: Throws a festive wreath that grows in size until exploding into icicle shards
Stealth strikes cause the wreath to suck in nearby enemies

name: Wulfrum Knife
tooltip: Stealth strikes make the knife fly further and hit several times at once

name: Wulfrum Shock Cutter
tooltip: Fires wulfrum shock cutters in bursts of 3
Stealth strikes make the cutters fly further and hit several times at once
Hold right click to magnetize all nearby cutters back to you
